known_issues: Backend connection error: backend actor missing required authentication methods (Expected: register). Suggested remediation: restart dfx replica clean and redeploy backend.

existing_features.title: Update the frontend authentication flow to call the backend `register` method (instead of simulating registration) and surface backend registration errors as user-facing English messages in the signup flow.
Ensure the frontend TypeScript backend actor typings include the `register` method so the app compiles and `useSafeActor` can safely validate the actor API at runtime.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a public shared backend actor method named `register` so the frontend runtime actor verification passes (it currently expects a `register` function to exist).

Implement backend registration logic that persists a new user's credentials/profile using the existing in-memory stores (e.g., usernames, credentialsStore, userProfiles) and returns a structured result indicating success or a specific error (e.g., already registered, username taken, email taken).
